items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty signals a muted start; US markets mixed, Asia trades higher
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: The Nasdaq and S&P 500 scored record closing highs on Monday, boosted by tech-related shares following the market's strong November gains, as investors awaited this week's economic data including the key monthly jobs report on Friday. Asian equities rose to follow the positive lead from Wall Street where a rally in the world’s largest technology companies drove stocks to fresh all-time highs.

items.title: Agri Picks Report December 03, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, Farmers in Rajasthan have sown rabi crops over 9.29 million hectares as of Saturday, up 9.8% on year from 8.46 million hectares sown in the corresponding period last year, according to a release by the state agriculture department.

items.title: Can Nifty, Sensex extend bull run to third straight day? | BPCL, Indegene in focus | Opening Bell
items.description:
Markets saw a smart recovery in the last session helped by strong gains in heavyweight stocks. Sensex and Nifty extended gains to second straight day. Experts now eye Nifty to see an immediate resistance of 24,550 with support placed around 24,000. This morning, global cues were strong. The US markets largely closed higher overnight, with the S&P 500 and NASDAQ Composite at record highs. Asia-Pacific markets, too, traded higher this morning.  Among stocks in focus, watch out for BPCL, Indegene and Nazara Tech. Catch Lovisha Darad in conversation with Ajit Mishra - SVP, Research, Religare Broking and Aditya Khemka, Fund Manager, InCred Asset Management.
#nse #bse #stockmarket #sharemarket #marketopeningbell

items.title: KPIT Tech to recover after recent underperformance, says JPMorgan
items.description: While the current pace of investments in EV and hybrid technologies has slowed, JPMorgan said that such investments will continue, though at a measured pace.

items.title: Swiggy shares extend gains, up nearly 10% ahead of Q2 earnings
items.description: Yesterday, the company said it has expanded its 10-minute food delivery offering, Bolt, to over 400 cities and towns across India.

items.title: Shivalik Bimetal Controls | Sufficient capacity for next leg of growth
items.description: Strategic efforts are bearing fruits for Shivalik Bimetal Controls, particularly in the European market. Expansion in other high-growth markets and the rising long-term demand for electric vehicles position the company for significant growth. Both the shunt and bimetal businesses are operating at around 40 percent capacity, highlighting a significant room to expand. As the North American market recovers and demand rebounds, Shivalik is poised to capitalise on emerging opportunities and drive sustained growth. The company has an overall revenue potential of Rs 1500-1600 crore at peak utilisation
